forge.trinity.pantheon module¶

class forge.trinity.pantheon.Pantheon(trinity, config, args)¶

Bases: forge.trinity.timed.Timed

A simple Cluster level interface for generic, persistent, and asynchronous computation over multiple remote Servers (God API)

Parameters

  • trinity – A Trinity object

  • config – A forge.blade.core.Config object

  • args – Hook for additional user arguments

distrib(packet)¶

Asynchronous wrapper around the step function function of all remote Servers (God level API)

Parameters

packet – Arbitrary user data broadcast to all Servers (God API)

Returns

A list of async handles to the step returns from all remote servers (God API)

step(packet=None)¶

Synchronous wrapper around the step function function of all remote Servers (God level API)

Parameters

packet – Arbitrary user data broadcast to all Servers (God API)

Returns

A list of step returns from all remote servers (God level API)
